title: Picasso's Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, European, Southern American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local restaurant serving higher-end American and Southern food. Menu includes a number of vegetarian entrees, and reported kitchen will tailor to suit where possible - vegans should specify. Makes food in house, including the hummus. Try the fried green tomatoes.
